title: Strengthening Service Quality Practice Competencies: Hybrid Passive-Active Learning in Analog Electronics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Understand and explain the basic principles of analog circuits, including amplifiers, filters, and power supply circuits.
Analyze circuit design problems and derive solutions using simulation tools through a hybrid learning model (passive-active integration).
Plan and execute analog electronics lab projects applicable to real educational settings using a PBL (Project-Based Learning) approach.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
